thread.title: Companies that left Long Island or downsized over the years
thread.title_full: Companies that left Long Island or downsized over the years | Newsday

author: newsday.com
title: Companies that left Long Island or downsized over the years
text:
Entenmann's, which had made Long Island its home for nearly a century, ceased production at its factory on Fifth Avenue in Bay Shore in August 2014. Bimbo Bakeries USA, the current owner of the building and Entenmann's parent company, still distributes baked goods out of the facility. (Credit: Jim Peppler)
Long Island has seen a number of companies big and small leave the area or reduce their presence over the years. Check out some of the most impactful losses or downsizes to hit LI....
